actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce, Empowerment, and Government Programs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Workforce, Empowerment, and Government Programs

official_title: To amend section 7(a) of the Small Business Act to exempt small business concerns owned and controlled by veterans who have been discharged or released from military service for less than 5 years from guarantee fees.
short_title: Veterans' Small Business Relief Act of 2001

summary.text: Veterans' Small Business Relief Act of 2001 - Amends the Small Business Act to exempt small business concerns owned and controlled by veterans who were discharged or released from military service for less than five years from loan guarantee fees.

titles.title: Veterans' Small Business Relief Act of 2001

To amend section 7(a) of the Small Business Act to exempt small business concerns owned and controlled by veterans who have been discharged or released from military service for less than 5 years from guarantee fees.
